attributes.action: Sever all ties and end all aid to Sudan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need to give this country a strong message that this sort of bullying is not accepted.  The inprisonment of Gillian Gibbons is wholly unacceptable and does nothing to promote any sort of religious harmony.  We should as a nation send out the strongest possible message that we will no longer put up with this.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
